lines.text: You said you were looking for work. Would you be interested in a job on the Martinez Ranch?
Well, that depends on who runs it.
Mr. Ferguson has a statement to make, folks. Haven't you, buster?
Well, I did have, but I'm kind of forgetful.
[Teddy Bear starts to drag Ferguson from the room]
Wait a minute! It's coming back to me! I'm beginning to remember!
I'm so hungry I could eat that gee-tar.
If they don't like this song, we'll both eat it.
And make broth out of the strings. Give 'em the works, Roy!
[Mary is searching for a lost treasure in her father's old mine]
Sure. My partner's a mining fool and I'm... well, I'm just a fool.
